name: Inverse Kinematics
description: Calculate the robot's inverse kinematic for a given plane.

inputParameters.name: plane
inputParameters.description: The plane or frame to calculate the inverse kinematic for.

inputParameters.name: start_configuration
inputParameters.description: If passed, calculates the inverse such that the joint positions differ the least from the start_configuration. Defaults to the zero configuration.

inputParameters.name: group
inputParameters.description: The planning group used for calculation. Defaults to the robot's main planning group.
